pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 13, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

1:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the welcoming ceremony for the President of Croatia, Kolinda Grabar-Kitarović.

Mackenzie Tower
Parliament Hill  

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Croatia, Kolinda Grabar-Kitarović.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will join Alex Trebek and Wade Davis for the opening of the new Centre for Geography and Exploration.

Centre for Geography and Exploration
50 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are expected to arrive by 4:00 p.m.

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a State Dinner hosted by Her Excellency the Right Honourable Julie Payette, Governor General of Canada.

Tent Room
Rideau Hall

Notes for media:

  • Media are expected to arrive by 6:00 p.m.
  • Pooled coverage during remarks at the beginning of the State dinner
  • Media accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery must confirm their attendance in advance with the Rideau Hall Press Office. For more information on accreditation, contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery at 613-992-6517.
